description:
• use code get50 to get 50% discount
  • Python is a high level programming language which is widely used for making applications that can be used for several purpose. It was developed by Guido van Rossum in late 80s its syntax allows programmers to express concepts in fewer lines of code than would be possible in languages such as C++ or Java.
  • Learning python is very easy .This tutorial has been designed for any individual who want to get into the software industry and are looking for useful resources and tutorials in python.
  • By the end of this course,you will have enough knowledge of Python programming language from where you can take yourself to a higher level of expertise. This course covers wide range of concepts ranging from variables to dictionary. The best way to do this course is to practise the codes by yourself while listening to the lectures.
title: programming in python
